name: Boulevard Bangle
description:
From Collection Two - Succession

Inspired by Edwardian tile patterns and the Exposition Universelle of 1900, the prints were designed between January & June, 2013. 

The porcelain form is hand crafted and refined through three separate firings, intercepted by polishing, glazing and the layering of digital illustration.

Each limited edition piece comes signed and numbered.

100 editions available. 

ORDER NOW

name: Braid Band Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 75 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.

name: Ribbon Cutter Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 50 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
The print on this piece was inspired by winning ribbons and summer skirts. It is a versatile piece that matches many outfits.
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.

name: Whistle Blower Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 50 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
The print on this piece was inspired by the action of a running race and colourful plastic whistles.
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.

This piece is temporally un-available. Email contact@erinlightfoot.com to request.

name: Zig Zag Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 50 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
The print on this piece was inspired by the pattern we've all drawn many times. The colours in this piece jump out and look lovely paired with coloured or grey tees.
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.

name: Franks Triangles Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 50 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
The print on this piece was inspired by the ever useful triangle and wallpaper by Frank Lloyd Wright. It looks wonderful with winter knits.
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.

name: Piece by Piece Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 30 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
The print on this piece was inspired by old school tetras. 
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.

name: Relay Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 30 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
The print on this piece was inspired by slalom racing flags. It is bright and cheery and looks perfect with a sunny dress or jeans and a tee.
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.

name: Blue Arrow Bangle
description:
This is a handmade porcelain piece finished with limited edition artwork. There are only 30 pieces in this style available. Each bangle is carefully hand formed, glazed and fired to a high temperature making it strong and robust. Finished with a gloss glaze it is smooth and lovely to wear. 
The print on this piece was inspired by 1970's jogging outfits and will go with many outfits of your own.
It will arrive to you in a gift box with extra gift wrapping available.
